Articles.Content: For some reason my ksp wasn't loading I did a fresh install several times and it still wasn't loading. Eventually I got the game to work but now my saved games take an hour to load even if I create a completely new one. If I click the screen the game will crash. I am confused why this is happening as it was fine a few days ago.

Post your KSP.log after reproducing the problem. 

It will help to find something to start the search.
So I had a look at my log and it was that I had mods relying on scatterer causing long loading times I installed it and it was fixed
